component.source:
<project> <include file="sys.xml"/> <include file="stopwatch.xml"/>
<stopwatch:initialize count="2"/>
<stopwatch:setName index="0" name="first"/> <stopwatch:setName index="1" name="second"/>
<stopwatch:start index="0"/> <wait delay="1000"/> <stopwatch:print index="0"/>
<stopwatch:start index="1"/> <parallel> <wait delay="2000"/> <wait delay="1000"/> </parallel>
<stopwatch:print index="1"/> <stopwatch:print index="0"/> </project>
